Summary Note:
Rissanen Hiltunen Heikkinen and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Helsinki. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Rissanen Hiltunen Heikkinen is a seasoned professional with over 19 years of experience.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Rissanen Hiltunen Heikkinen is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Rissanen finished secondary school at Lahti Christian Institute in 2001.
Rissanen attended Aalto University and graduated in 2007.
Occupation History:
Rissanen Hiltunen Heikkinen is a 42 year old Regional Vice President from Finland.
Rissanen Hiltunen Heikkinen began his professional journey as a Hotel Manager at Scandic Hotels Oy in 2006, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of General Manager at Sokos Hotels in 2009, further expanding his skill set.
At Radisson Blu Hotels, he worked as a Regional Vice President from 2015 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 180000 EUR.
He owns house in Turku, where he resides. It is worth 1160000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 4950000 EUR from his late mother, a renowned Tech Entrepreneur, in 2012.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
